comment.author: 87335114@N03
comment._content: Top photo shows a guy dressed as a "John Bull". Always had a guy behind him with a whip beating him. Used to be a big carnival attraction when I was a child. Was scared stiff of them LOL. He would go around chasing children and then the man with the whip would come and start beating him.

comment.author: 87298822@N05
comment._content: "John Bull" and the man behind him carried a "clap whip" and used it to make that cracking noise in the air around the John Bull and the John Bull would chase you and you had to throw coins into the cup of the man with the clap whip. The 80's was the last I heard of John Bulls. This looks like Independence Drive (East Street).

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: This is fascinating, thank you. We know so little about these Antigua pictures so all these details are extremely valuable.
